Text: Cest la vie Cc If you guys have been keeping up you know Enron Europe is waving the white flag and shutting down Our email addresses and our jobs are being deactivated as of midday tomorrow so you can reach us at Telephone We obviously dont have an elaborate backup plan yet as we were too busy working for the The Worlds Leading Company So we cant say where we will eventually end up but please keep in touch and let us know how you all are doing We miss working with all of you guys If there is an email list for Portland put together someone send it our way Hang in there Monica and Kristian Please forward this to anyone we might have missed

RE Cest la vieTell Deb hello and you guys hang in there We were telling everyone at our Halloween party this year all about you guys and your superior parties Good luck to you too Original Message From Forney John M Sent November To Lande Monica Subject RE Cest la vie Deb and I think of you guys from time to time I am looking for a new gig as well Enron Texas is having a great year again trading but I am somehow out of work out of credit at least Stay in touch and good luck JForney Original Message From Lande Monica Sent Thursday November AM To Scholtes Diana Semperger Cara Dunton Heather Wente Laura Nelson Kourtney Chang Fran Stokley Chris Mainzer Elliot Perry Todd Richter Jeff Postlethwaite John Platter Phillip Crandall Sean Choi Paul Malowney John Badeer Robert Belden Tim Rosman Stewart Poston David Forney John M Day Smith L Miller Jeffrey Cc Lande Kristian Subject Cest la vie If you guys have been keeping up you know Enron Europe is waving the white flag and shutting down Our email addresses and our jobs are being deactivated as of midday tomorrow so you can reach us at Telephone We obviously dont have an elaborate backup plan yet as we were too busy working for the The Worlds Leading Company So we cant say where we will eventually end up but please keep in touch and let us know how you all are doing We miss working with all of you guys If there is an email list for Portland put together someone send it our way Hang in there Monica and Kristian Please forward this to anyone we might have missed

Cest la vie Cc PST If you guys have been keeping up you know Enron Europe is waving the white flag and shutting down Our email addresses and our jobs are being deactivated as of midday tomorrow so you can reach us at Telephone We obviously dont have an elaborate backup plan yet as we were too busy working for the The Worlds Leading Company So we cant say where we will eventually end up but please keep in touch and let us know how you all are doing We miss working with all of you guys If there is an email list for Portland put together someone send it our way Hang in there Monica and Kristian Please forward this to anyone we might have missed

Re Visit to Portlandnsf If you havent been able to get the Livelink system to work this might be a good opportunity to get it on your PC Kim S Theriot AM To Jan M CT Christian CT Chris H CT Mary CT Cara CT Diana CT Monica CT Stewart CT Carla CT Robert CT cc Subject Visit to Portland I am planning to come to the Portland Office on Mon Jan and Tues Jan I am planning to bring Melissa Murphy with me so that she can meet everyone in the office Melissa is taking over as Lead for me on Power since my responsibilities have grown the past few months I will still be directly responsible for Power Confirmations but am now also responsible for management of PhysicalFinancial Gas Confirmations Contracts and Financial Settlements I was thinking of also bringing someone to do some training on Livelink the document imaging system I know that a few of you have been encountering problems when using the application I would like for this person to see they types of problems that you are having so that we can get them fixed As well I know that there are a few more advanced features of Livelink that may be of interest ie project sharing etc Let me know you thoughts on this or if you think that it would be beneficial to you and others in the office for a Livelink rep to come with me Thanks Kim Theriot

Merced deal correctionnsf To all I ran a minibook valuing the Merced correction as of yesterdays curves and confirmed that the LTNW book will lose approximately MM in value after the calc today This reverses the MM gain that was incorrectly shown in the LTNW book on yesterdays DPR Please let me know if there are any questions Thanks Monica
Re Index forwardsswapsnsf Monica Lande AM To Robert CT cc Subject Index forwardsswaps

New Global Risk Standards for Trading Please Read Cc To all Over the past few months Energy Operations has formally established global standards Exception reporting will officially begin for the West Desk on Monday November th The exception reporting around these standards will help us gauge our performance and highlight areas for improvement better allocate resources to issue areas ensure individual and global business controllers are up to date as to arising issues To accomplish this numerous requirements have been established The requirement that affects trading is as follows Transactions are recorded accurately and timely completeness accuracy Transactions are recorded with accuracy and valued appropriately in an approved risk system for the applicable product Transactions are input into Enpower or TAGG on date of trade prior to calc HOW THIS AFFECTS WEST TRADERS The Risk group in Portland and Confirmations group in Houston will now begin reporting any exceptions to the above requirement on a daily basis Any deals entered late incorrectly or changed after the calc will require full written explanation to the Global Risk Controls group this includes trader name The materiality of the deal is not relevant you can be written up for MW deals or MW deals The Global Risk Controls group is looking for flaws in the process whether it be peoplerelated or system related This exception reporting begins on Monday Please come to the Risk group with any questions you may have we would like the West Desk to appear on the exception report as infrequently as possible If you have any special deal types that you believe will be in violation of the above requirement please notify Risk so we can communicate this to Global Risk Controls Thanks for your help in this matter West Risk

Re Index forwardsswaps Cc Bob Badeer is handling the negotiations of the index changes and he has assured me that all deals liquidating within this month have been updated He is still working out the other deals If this is causing you any difficulty please let me know Thanks Monica Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Kimberly Allen AM To Monica CT Kate CT cc Melissa Ann CT Subject Re Index forwardsswaps Kate Monica do you know when these will be changed in Enpower to reflect the Dow Jones Index Thanks Kimberly Indelicato Forwarded by Kimberly AllenHOUECT on PM Enron North America Corp From Kimberly Allen AM To Kate CT cc Monica CT Subject Re Index forwardsswaps Hey Ladies Just wondering when these trades might be changed within Enpower Thanks Kimberly Kate Symes PM To Kimberly CT cc Subject Re Index forwardsswaps Monica Lande also came up with a list of our outstanding deals with the PX It contains most of the same deals that are found in your spreadsheet and a few that arent Also Bob Badeer has become the leaderbydefault of this project Let me know if youd like me to talk with him about our progress or have him call you Im not sure how involved you are or how involved youd like me to be but I thought Id keep you up to date on the happenings over here Again please let me know how I can help Thanks Kate Forwarded by Kate SymesPDXECT on AM Monica Lande AM To Kate CT cc Subject Re Index forwardsswaps Monica Lande AM To Robert CT cc Subject Index forwardsswaps

Karin ES Sony CT ONeal D CT Christa CT Jeremy CT Rita CT cc Subject Final Name ChangeMerger Notification Attached is the Preliminary Name ChangeMerger notification report for Nov The final list with any additions will go out on Wed Nov Name overlays will be done today Mon Nov right after notification is given and shortname changes will be done on Wed Nov Records on this report will be inactivated on Fri Dec HAPPY THANKSGIVING Cheryl x

Deals and Cc Sharen I changed deal from MW to MW price from to and I changed deal from MW to MW and the price from to We need to reconfirm both of these deals please contact Stewart Rosman with any questions Thanks Monica

Re DJ CalISO Declares Stage One Emergency MW Off Line Fo recast Demand May Surpass RecordHoffman AM To Tim CT Robert CT Jeff CT Phillip CT Mike CT Diana CT Sean CT Matt CT Mark CT Tom CT Mark CT Monica CT cc Subject DJ CalISO Declares Stage One Emergency MW Off Line Fo recast Demand May Surpass Record Forwarded by Carla HoffmanPDXECT on AM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Pergher Gunther AM To undisclosedrecipients cc Subject DJ CalISO Declares Stage One Emergency MW Off Line Fo recast Demand May Surpass Record FYI Gnther GMT December DJ CalISO Declares Stage One Emergency MW Off Line MORE Dow Jones Newswires EST DJ CalISO Lines Down Tripped MW Generator Off Grid MORE Dow Jones Newswires EST Forecast Demand May Surpass Record LOS ANGELES Dow Jones A kilovolt and a kilovolt line went down near Bakersfield Calif Monday morning and tripped a megawatt generator off line causing a stage one power emergency a spokeswoman for the California Independent System Operator said The identity of the generator which went off line about AM PST GMT wasnt immediately available One of the two power lines that went down is now back up but a spokeswoman couldnt identify which line it was A total of MW is off line Monday with MW off the grid for planned maintenance and MW off for unplanned maintenance spokeswoman Stephanie McCorkle said McCorkle said Mondays forecast peak was MW near the record winter peak of MW reached Dec McCorkle also said there is a good chance Mondays forecast peak could change and surpass the record winter peak Electricity forward prices in the MidColumbia River hub were higher Monday than they were last summer when demand outstripped supply January was trading Monday at MWh and balanceofDecember was trading at MWh Thirdquarter trades were at MWh A market participant said the ISO had a call out to buy MW of power from outside of California which is usually done only in emergency situations But the ISO didnt comment on that The stage one emergency which means operating reserves in the state are below was expected to remain in effect until PM PST GMT McCorkle said she didnt anticipate the state would go to a stage two emergency when voluntary power curtailments may be instituted for customers who agree to cut power for reduced rates By Jessica Berthold Dow Jones Newswires END Dow Jones Newswires GMT Gnther A Pergher Senior Analyst Dow Jones Company Inc Tel Fax The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer
